title: The Bobbything
description: "AN AMAZING PIECE OF WRITING.." - Malcolm McDowellA 13 year old boy... A Whip... A man chained to a beam...This is the start of The Bobbything, Yuri Storasi's dark and desperate story. Philip is so excited because the next day he is going to the funfair with his Uncle Bob and together they're going to ride the big green catterpillar - faster than light! But Uncle Bob has changed their plans. He's not taking his nephew to the fair. Philip is a special little boy and he deserves something better. What started as a special day turns into a nightmare. But in fairy tales, anything can happen..The Bobbything is a powerful tale of isolation and desperation. The book features a foreword by Chris Wade. Also available as an audiobook, read by film legend Malcolm McDowell.
author: Yuri Storasi
